channel.title: Need help with assigning pk
channel.description: im trying to make a assasin minigame where you select somone to be killed and everyone is able to hunt them no matter where they are. i can assign the person that is going to be killed but cannot make others e able to hunt that guy down in any area... also if you tell me where i can find "Admins pk anywhere" tut is.

item.title: Need help with assigning pk
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

Well then your only other option would be searching through 115 pages or asking a CM if they have a direct link. Which, I doubt they do.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with assigning pk
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

Well I cannot help you with that put try using the search button. Just type in “Admins PK” you’ll come up with something, also… If you cannot find it there check out Lothy’s tutorial list, that will help you a lot.

Read full topic
